summary: Adds a fire to the fireplace of the White Phial in Windhelm.
descriptionHtml: Ever wonder why Nurelion sits in front of an empty fireplace, sometimes looking into it as though he were looking into a fire?  Or why the bedroom of an elderly, ailing Altmer in one of the coldest cities in Skyrim doesn\'t have a lit fire... or any other form of heat for that matter?  This simple mod addresses just that by adding a fire to the upstairs fireplace in the White Phial.  Master files are, obviously, Skyrim.esm and Update.esm.
author: EnlilofNippur
